VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Rusty Kettle relative to Emerald Diner?
SRP.A: The Rusty Kettle is {below} Emerald Diner in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Rusty Kettle}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Cozy Nook}.

VE.Q: What is The Cozy Nook's Customer Traffic in 2010?
VE.A: The Cozy Nook's customer traffic in 2010 is {251.56} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is Sky High Cafe's Customer Traffic in 2016?
VE.A: Sky High Cafe's customer traffic in 2016 is {138.38} customers/day.

VE.Q: What is The Rusty Kettle's Customer Traffic in 2014?
VE.A: The Rusty Kettle's customer traffic in 2014 is {633.15} customers/day.

VE.Q: What are the customer traffic of Sky High Cafe, The Cozy Nook, and Emerald Diner in 2005?
VE.A: Sky High Cafe's customer traffic is {453.83} customers/day, The Cozy Nook's customer traffic is {400.98} customers/day, Emerald Diner's customer traffic is {580.31} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Customer Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum customer traffic is {22.77} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Customer Traffic in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum customer traffic is {647.86} customers/day.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Customer Traffic level recorded for Emerald Diner?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner reached approximately {629.95} customers/day in {2004}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Customer Traffic?
SC.A: The average total customer traffic is {1526.57} customers/day.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic exceed 1666.34 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {2081.04} customers/day in {2003}, {1696.58} customers/day in {2010}, {1817.04} customers/day in {2009}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic go below 1324.84 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {1107.69} customers/day in {2018}, {1096.08} customers/day in {2016}, {1220.07} customers/day in {2012}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Traffic fall between 1420.81 and 1570.37 customers/day? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2015 and 2017, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 2007 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 2015 and 2017 was {lower} than between 2007 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2019, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2004 and 2005?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 2008 and 2019 was {larger} than between 2004 and 2005.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2015, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 2003 and 2008?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 2004 and 2015 was {lower} than between 2003 and 2008.

NC.Q: Between 2016 and 2018, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2007 and 2019?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 2016 and 2018 was {smaller} than between 2007 and 2019.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {The Rusty Kettle} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sky High Cafe, The Cozy Nook, Emerald Diner, The Rusty Kettle}.
